TopicTitle: How Can You Grapple Onto Surfaces? (Or Can You Only Do That With a Mod?)

Articles.Content:
So, I'm planning on making a base on Duna. It's going well so far, but is there anything that can grapple to the surface?

If there is no way but there is a mod please tell me

Thanks:)

If u want an hard point attachment to the ground, i think that the Advanced Grabbing Unit (AKA the Claw) can be planted in the surface and give u what u need.

Otherwhise u can use the KAS mod (Kerbal Attachment System), it have ground pylons that u can place on EVA, a way to deploy struts on the fly, and also anchor and other connection stuff.

Edited November 21, 2014 by Keymaster89
The claw can't attach to planets or moons, only asteroids, vessels and kerbals.
